title: Green Truck Pub
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Southern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Atmosphere is hip and welcoming to vegetarians/vegans. Try the vegan black bean chili and the vegan mighty veg sandwich. Any burger can be made with an in-house-made vegan veggie patty (which is clearly indicated on the menu).
